title: Fried Rice in Pineapple, Thai Style
ingredients: 150 g straw mushrooms, or small brown mushrooms
instructions: Soak rice in a bowl covered with water for 30 minutes. Drain and rinse under running water until clear. Boil 600 ml water, add rice and salt, and simmer for about 10 minutes. Finish cooking in a preheated oven at 150°C. Remove and let cool for at least 3 hours, can also be refrigerated overnight. Peel and dice shallots and garlic. Cut Chinese cabbage leaves into thin strips, remove the core. Cut the pineapple in half lengthwise, leaving the crown intact. Hollow the halves and cut the fruit into small cubes. Clean mushrooms and halve if necessary. Heat oil in a wok, sauté shallots and garlic without browning. Stir in turmeric, curry powder, and sugar, and sauté briefly. Add cabbage, pineapple, and mushrooms, stir-fry for about 5 minutes. Add cold cooked rice and stir-fry for another 5 minutes. Fill the rice mixture into the pineapple halves and bake in the preheated oven at 180°C for about 10 minutes, then serve.
